testcase.name: Login into Amazon and verifying customer page - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon website................................................passed When I click on Hello! Sign In link at the top-right corner.................passed And I am navigated to Amazon Sign-In page...................................passed And I get Amazon Sign-In details from excel data sheet with sheetname "LoginDetails" and row-number 0.passed Then I place my username or phone number and click on Continue button.......passed And I am navigated to password input page and verify page...................passed Then I place my password and tick keep me signed in and click on Sign in button.passed And I verify my Amazon account is logged in.................................passed
